labels.name: A: In progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.reddit.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.reddit.com%2F) ### Comment > This Google popup appears on multiple websites. I have used the Adguard Browser Assistant many times to block it to no avail. The Assistant no longer recognizes the popup when I move the cursor over it... > > On the same Reddit website using Brave browser and Adguard web based blocker, the Google ad is blocked... ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/mft7dwtcfuowgw4o8kokokkcoskck00rh3rlpuifkg.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.14 Browser: | Firefox AdGuard driver: | TDI Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `system default`
Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection Userscripts: | Assistant, Extra, Popup Blocker, Other extensions used: | Bitdefender

issue.title: stwater.co.uk
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Content Blocker

### AdGuard version

2.1.72.49

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly, Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.stwater.co.uk/in-my-area/check-my-area/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Send Do-Not-Track signals

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Comment

When any of the filters listed are enabled, the page doesn't load and only returns a white screen. This is blocking a cookie screen that is needed to progress to the next screen.

* AdGuard Annoyances filter
* AdGuard – Cookie Notices

2. Screenshots

* Filters enabled - https://i.imgur.com/obNwjhA.png
* Filters disabled - https://i.imgur.com/mAZBdV3.png

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
